snippet: Hearing the words Oakland Raiders and playoffs in the same sentence is only going to happen if it's related to fantasy football, as Week 14 marks the start of the fake postseason for many fantasy owners.
abstract: Hearing the words Oakland Raiders and playoffs in the same sentence is only going to happen if it's related to fantasy football, as Week 14 marks the start of the fake postseason for many fantasy owners.

headline.main: Week 14 in Fantasy Football: Thursday's Matchup
